pages.text:
HOST A GROUP EVENT
AT CLUB CHAMPION
WHY CLUB CHAMPION
Club Champion, the globe's top premium golf club fitter
, is the perfect place to host your group or corporate event! Impress clients, investors, or friends with golf events or custom fitting events at your local Club Champion studio.
We have the latest and greatest golf club technology from every major brand in the golf industry (and then some!) available at our stores. Even better, we use industry-leading technology like SAM PuttLab and TrackMan swing analysis to find the perfect fit for each of our customers.
Whether it’s a sales meeting, a thank you to valued customers or employees, a fundraiser, or just a celebration, we can help you create a one-of-a-kind day for your guests. For more information, please email:
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
.
FAQS
How much does it cost per person?
We do not charge per person; we charge an event fee that starts at $2,000. This covers a minimum of ten club fittings, at least one master fitter, complete rental of the fitting studio, use of our fitting technology, and all club follow-up. Additionally, we do require a minimum of ten club purchases.
What other fees will I have to pay?
Sales tax and shipping. There is no tax on the event fee; you’ll only pay tax on the equipment purchased. Shipping is free if your group opts to pick their new clubs up from the store, but a nominal fee applies if we ship direct-to-home.
What clubs can you fit for group events?
We suggest putters for group events. They are cost-efficient and they leave the hitting bays open for use while other guests wait to be fitted. We can also do driver or wedges for group fittings, though the time and cost commitment vary.
Can we host an event during business hours?
Yes! We ask that you keep events toward the end of the day if you host during business hours.
Will my guests leave with the clubs that day?
Unfortunately, no; our custom building process takes about
5-7 weeks
to be completed and delivered.
Does Club Champion provide catering?
We do not, but you’re welcome to bring food and beverages from an outside vendor.
EQUIPMENT COSTS
Here are the Club Champion pricing tiers and equipment offerings for group events:
PUTTER FITTINGS
Tier 1: Scotty Cameron Super Select - $450
Tier 2: Taylormade Spider GTx - $350
Tier 3: Odyssey White Hot Versa - $260
Prices reflect the cost of the putter and a
custom grip, before taxes
DRIVER FITTINGS
Tier 1: Taylormade Stealth 2 - $860
Tier 2: Cobra AeroJet - $810
Tier 3: Srixon ZX5 and ZX7 MK II - $760
Prices reflect the clubhead, a shaft
from the Mitsubishi C6 range and a
custom grip, before taxes
WEDGE FITTINGS
Tier 1: Titleist SM9 - $570
Tier 2: Mizuno S23 - $530
Prices reflect the clubhead, a shaft from the True Temper Dynamic Gold range and a custom grip for a set of TWO WEDGES, before taxes
Please note: these brands are subject to availability and may change. We offer a 10% discount on equipment costs for purchases of 10+ clubs.
THINGS TO CONSIDER
All events are subject to fitter availability.
We can facilitate 4 putter fittings, 6 driver fittings or 8 wedge fittings per hour at most locations.
The non-refundable event fee is due no later than 10 business days before the event date. Club purchases are made at the event, after fittings are completed.
Equipment customizations like stamping and/or paint fill are available on putters and wedges for $5 per character.
BOOK YOUR EVENT TODAY
Email for more information or to book your event:
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
.

CLUB CHAMPION LOCATIONS
We are the globe’s top club fitter, with more than 120 locations worldwide, specializing in custom golf club sets built from the best brands of golf clubs. Each studio offers industry-leading Master Fitters and Master Builders who fit and handcraft every club to your unique needs. These comprehensive custom club fittings help you play to your absolute potential. We’re happy to fit to your existing set or fit you for new clubs.
A personalized experience for all level golfers to create an unmatched golf club fitting with the top brands in golf and customize the best set of golf clubs for you based on our certified club fitters suggestions. Set an appointment to get fitted for custom golf clubs near you and exceed your golf potential!

THE CLUB CHAMPION STORY
ABOUT US
PERFORMANCE IS OUR PROMISE
Established in 2010, Club Champion has grown from a regional three-studio fitting business to a trusted golf club fitting expert with locations in every major golf market nationwide. Our Tour-level fittings were designed by Master Fitter and Builder Nick Sherburne, the company’s founder.
Nick found his way into golf club fitting in 1998 by helping out with club repairs and custom fitting at EJL Golf. With the advent of launch monitors, new shaft technology, grip updates and clubhead advancements, Nick shifted his mindset about fitting. No longer just an art, the science and technique of a proper fitting became a founding principle for the future of Club Champion.
Former CEO Joe Lee and former chairman Keith Bank partnered with Nick in 2010 to launch the budding brand. They saw potential in the idea that professional-level services were just as valuable to amateur players in the golf world — if we play the same equipment and wear the same clothing as the pros, we should be able to customize our game the same way as well. The business acumen of Joe and Keith combined with Nick’s passion and experience helped catapult the brand to the forefront of the fitting industry.
“We went from a Chicagoland staple to a flourishing brand because we saw the huge difference fitted equipment can make in a golfer’s game and we’re making that improvement available to everyone through our expansion to markets across the U.S.," says Lee.
A decade later, Club Champion employs over 220 team members, including roughly 150 fitters nationwide. We’ve been featured in CNBC, Forbes, Sports Illustrated, Golf Digest, The Wall Street Journal, USA Today and more, and we are a perennial National Golf Foundation Top 100 company. We’re also a regular feature on Golf Digest’s semi-annual Top 100 fitter list, driven in part by the more than 100,000 fittings we complete per year.
Our story is still being written, as we have plans for further expansion both in the U.S. and internationally.
WE WENT FROM A CHICAGOLAND STAPLE TO A FLOURISHING BRAND BECAUSE WE SAW THE HUGE DIFFERENCE FITTED EQUIPMENT CAN MAKE IN A GOLFER’S GAME AND WE’RE MAKING THAT IMPROVEMENT AVAILABLE TO EVERYONE THROUGH OUR EXPANSION TO MARKETS ACROSS THE U.S.
”
Joe Lee
Joe Lee
Club Champion Founder
& Chairman

CONTACT CLUB CHAMPION
CONTACT US
IF YOU HAVE A QUESTION, COMMENT, OR CONCERN, CONTACT US TODAY.
Due to high call volumes, we recommend emailing us at the address below if you have a question, comment, or concern. Please be sure to include your name and your nearest Club Champion location.
We will strive to get back to you within one business day. Thank you for your patience, and we look forward to working with you.
CORPORATE HEADQUARTERS
7501 S. Quincy St.
Suite 130
Willowbrook, IL 60527
Call today —
(630) 654-3301
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
AN UNRIVALED FITTING PROCESS
Ready to revolutionize your rounds? Just come in, hit and let some of the world’s best fitters work their magic. Using Tour-level tech, they’ll analyze every metric of your game. And tap over 65,000 club combinations to create the perfect set for your unique swing.
It’s a proven process – one that produces greater enjoyment, lower scores and instant improvement.
Learn More About Our Fitting Process
